website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive dip belt with multiple colorful design choices that you'll love to wear.
pros: Made of good materials that will be comfortable to use for repeated workouts
Uses a 36-inch steel chain to deliver excellent performance levels and hold a large amount of weight securely
Carries a desirable price point and fun designs
cons: Consists primarily of a neoprene material, which can't match leather's longevity

customer_reviews.title: I love this belt I use it for my weighted dips ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt I use it for my weighted dips & pull ups and it Does not disappoint At all . Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: I’ve trained with this belt a few times already loading 25-50 lbs each session. The belt has handled the weight very good. I would recommend this to anyone looking to buy a dip belt. You can’t beat the price! This is my second product from dmoose.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training belt for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt! I use it daily for every one of my workouts for arms and the belt has never given me any problems. Supports up to (2) 45-lb plates, possibly even more. Has a tight fit and will not slip off your body during your workout! Highly recommend! See my video!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected. You are going to love this!
customer_reviews.author: William Schlesinger

customer_reviews.title: This belt is made to hold a lot of weight and is made to perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dip belt l. It's very resilient for people like me that want to use heavy weight when doing pullups or dips. The quality is amazing and the colors are bright and reflective of I'm not mistaken. So that's means night training for you earlier birds and crossfitters. Overall 10 out 10 for this belt. I definitely recommend this to be a must in any fitnes center or gym.
customer_reviews.author: loris henry west jr

customer_reviews.title: Love this belt
customer_reviews.text: Love this belt. It’s Sturdy a comfortable. It held up well no matter how much weight I added to it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great belt helps alot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, Works very well i put 90 pounds on it with no trouble
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Belt
customer_reviews.text: This dip belt was absolute garbage. I loaded up 90 pounds on it for weighted pull-ups and it only lasted 2 uses before the main D loop on the chain bent open and the nylon frayed. I think the chain is super soft aluminum and not steel and the nylon the belt is made out of is very low quality. Avoid at all costs!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: AwwWwWWwwWWW - YeeeaaAaAAAAHHH
customer_reviews.text: This belt feels like it should survive plenty of rough workouts in the future. The band is plenty thick and wide to absorb and distribute the force of the weighted chain evenly around your body. It is a little stiff out of the box, but better that than too loose. The chain is strong, should fit through most any weight plate you hit, etc. Anyways, I'm revieweing a dip belt, so there's only so much to analyze. Really, what set this belt apart from the competition for me was 1) the ridiculous blue camo, and 2) the frikkin' awesome flexing moose. Usually I hate logos or brands on my stuff but this moose is just pure genius plain and simple.
customer_reviews.author: david k.

customer_reviews.title: works, but would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but isn't long enough (and I'm only 32" waist) and doesn't sit right compared to other dip belts. Low quality materials seem like it will not hold up long at all
customer_reviews.author: Cross

customer_reviews.title: Great fit if you're fat
customer_reviews.text: I had a bulk that went a bit out of control, so I am quite a bit fatter than I would like. It was tough finding an affordable belt that could fit my Tank Abbott body. Luckily this belt fits the bill. I knocked a star off because the chain, while fine for using with plates for dips and pull-ups, will tear up your barbell if you're doing belt squats. Just wrap a towel around the barbell and problem solved, but it's still a minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rustles

customer_reviews.title: D-Moose never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: D-moose has the sturdiest gear for the gym i can find. The belt itself is very very sturdy. The chains are steel and were rattling in the package. I was excited hearing it like a kid on Christmas. This isn't my first d-moose product so i bought this with confidence knowing it would be what i expected. The best. I did own a pair of ankle straps but i ruined them myself. Take care of your gear and it will do you right
customer_reviews.author: im

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, functional, performs well
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Took me a minute to figure out how exactly everything hooked together but I eventually got it. Belt seems very sturdy and appears that it could potentially hold a considerable amount of weight. I used a plate when doing pull-ups and the belt performed quite well. Will continue to mess with the placement around my hips a bit for better comfort but overall this is exactly what I was looking for. Will work very well! From the reviews that I read one of the critical comments mentioned something about the clips being sharp. They are, but if you are careful you have nothing to worry about. Great belt and seems to do what it was designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: TS7713

customer_reviews.title: I purchased for my Fiancee
customer_reviews.text: He loves this belt. He took it too the gym the very next day and was very happy with it and with me. He said it was comfortable and made his workout easier. He was looking for a belt for quite some time and was happy to be back in the gym with this one. He says it was good quality material and he loves the design he chose. He loved it. Treats this belt like its his baby. He was very pleased with the quality and functionality. IT was comfortable and easy to use."
customer_reviews.author: Curtrina Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: So far the Dmoose Dip Belt has been great, especially for the price point. I use it for adding weight on pull ups. Also, I did decide it’s a bit easier to use if one passes one clip end through the unclipped d ring, through the weights, and then clip it to the same d ring that the other end is clipped to. Less tendency for the belt to want to slide of the hips.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Benz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality dip/pull-up belt
customer_reviews.text: The belt arrived very quickly. It was very affordable and I bought it initially because of the low price. I expected something that would be functional, but I didn't expect the high quality build and material of this belt. Much higher quality than others I've used and at a lower price point. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kip Owens

customer_reviews.title: Bought this a while ago, still working strong
customer_reviews.text: I held off on the review to see how it fairs. I bought this a while ago and mainly use it to do reverse squats off the leg part of a mutli-workout bench i.e. start squated and stand up instead of start standing and go down. No issues with the chain holding 150-200 lbs of weights. And no issues with squishing and clamping from the belt itself, the cushion is just robust and firm enough to not bother my hips.
customer_reviews.author: Tyr2009

customer_reviews.title: Not for those dipping or squatting heavy weights.
customer_reviews.text: This is a light weight dip belt. The threads used to sew the D-ings in place are too thin and too few. The belt malfunctioned for me after 6 uses. The D-rings simply came off when the thread tore. I think one could get long service if light weights are used, something under 100 lbs. Beyond that, shear forces that cause any twisting of the D-rings will eventually tear the weak binding threads. It needs to be riveted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another Excellent Piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: This company is really hitting it out of the park when it comes to quality exercise equipment. Belt is very comfortable. My only minor complaint is I wish the chain was a bit longer, as I'm a larger man and need the extra length but I just hooked another piece of chain to the belt and I'm good to go. Definitely recommend the company and the belt.
customer_reviews.author: Laqudis

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the sharp edges!
customer_reviews.text: The belt itself is great quality and comfortable. The chain, though, leaves much to be desired. As the other reviewers have mentioned, the edges are sharp and it’ll easily slice your fingers open if you’re not careful. If they couldn’t get the quality up, maybe they should’ve included a metal file.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Liang

customer_reviews.title: Read the included directions and it will work perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the enclosed directions at first and thought the chain was too long. You just need to thread it through both sides to get a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality dip belt at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dip belt...a lot. I’ve used plenty of them in the gym but decided to add one to my home gym and went with the DMoose Fitness brand. The belt is really sturdy and wears well. The quality is top-notch with premium stitching and solid hardware. For the price, you absolutely can’t beat the DMoose!
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money and buy these
customer_reviews.text: My metal clip bent and won’t close right after I put 135 pounds on the belt. I probably linked it up wrong but still. I’ll buy a new clip cause the belt itself is solid. Very sturdy and doesn’t cut unlike the cheaper 20$ version i bought before. Plus GO AMERICA.
customer_reviews.author: Happy C

customer_reviews.title: Chain is long enough
customer_reviews.text: I admittedly haven't used a lot of different way to do it belts but, his one is solid. One of my shopping concerns with this item was the length of the chain. This chain is long enough to allow you to use the center hole or the handles on the plates if you prefer. Very well designed product made of durable materials. Comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add to my “gym” at home so I can do weighted pull-ups and dips. It is comfortable and works as it’s intended. The chain won’t fit through some of my weights that have smaller holes but it isn’t a problem since I have other weights that do work. Just something to keep in mind. I’ve only had this belt for about a month but it seems sturdy enough to last as long as you don’t completely overload it. This is the second product I’ve purchased from this company and I’m very pleased with both products.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your Gym
customer_reviews.text: It works great and as expected. Love the flag design. My biggest gripe is that the D-Rings are all the way closed so sometimes the fabric works its way out of its place. Its a great price though and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G.

customer_reviews.title: Great find!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of my gym losing their dip belts so I broke down and got this one. For the price it's definitely worth it. I've worked out with it a few times now and no problems. Holds two 45lbs plates just fine for dips and pullups. Will update review if needed but I don't think I'll have to.
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, nice wide belt, and comfortable... everything a dip belt should be. Never heard of DMoose, so I was skeptical at first, but for $15.00 I figured it was worth a shot. Have been using it for 4 months now, 4x a week, and it looks brand new. Since then I have purchased some DMoose lifting gloves, and I love them too. I'm diggin this company, glad I took a chance on them!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy belt
customer_reviews.text: Used the belt for the first time yesterday, 4/28/19, and it is solid but comfortable. Had no trouble holding 2 plates. When I opened the package, I was surprised at how heavy duty it was built. Solid value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I just got this recently and well it’s not that expensive and for the price it’s good quality. People that are expecting to have a super high quality chain you need to have the proper expectations. The chain is good for the price and so is the D ring. It could easily support a plate and maybe a 25. If you need more weight just replace the D ring and chain.
customer_reviews.author: Tris Honnes

customer_reviews.title: Dip Belt
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It is what we expected. It took only 2 days for arriving. We cannot wait to begin exercising. It will be used often.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid Doolaege

customer_reviews.title: Star Spangled and Shredded!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I found this product and could barely wait for it to arrive! The day I received it I put it on, chained a weight plate to it, and went straight for my pull up/ dip station. This thing did not disappoint! Very well made and comfortable. I've never been so red, white, and ripped!
customer_reviews.author: Suede

customer_reviews.title: Stitched well but the chain leave alot to be desired
customer_reviews.text: All in all its nice but i think i will be replacing the chain and carabiners and they feel like the weak link. The rest of the belt feel pretty solid and is stitched nicely but the chain feels dainty. With a better chain (even at a slightly higher price) this would be 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use dipping belt.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I mainly use it for Donkey calf raises (modified version) I’ve loaded 90 lbs on it without any issues so far. Feels comfortable and durable. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks G.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This belt does the trick. So far i have added up to 45 lbs plates to it while doing dips and pull ups. The chain links are not filed down so you do need to be careful when handling, but its a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Collegecustomer123

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I think this is a great belt!
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine and although the chain is not as strong as a commercial one, it seems to suffice. I would agree that the carabiner is probably underrated for the weight load and would be the weakest link for heavier weight. I can go to the local hardware store and buy one like this for 59 cents and does not have a high weight capacity. Aesthetically it goes with the chain, but probably not the best for overall weight bearing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr T. Man

customer_reviews.title: Helping me do heavier pulls ups and dips!
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you want to slowly start to add weight to your pull ups and dips. The product is well built, chain is sturdy and if you don't want the weight to be too low you can double loop the chain to keep weight close to you. Chain is long enough to add more than 1 plate if you want heavier weight. Again, great product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It works, it's just really hard at first. Not pliable at all. Must have been in packaging for some time. But none the less, it's a weighting tool that does what it's designed to do. You can hand the chain log or short if doubled.
customer_reviews.author: joe callesano

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for several months, its solid. It does what a weight belt does. Stitching is good, the clips work well, no tares or noticeable imperfections. I have a fairly small waste (29-30) and it fits nicely. There's plenty of room for it to expand of course.
customer_reviews.author: R. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Started doing weighted dips again and needed a belt. I saw this one and the quality looked good and it is! The price is very reasonable for what you get. I will post again in a few months about durability, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Y

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was concerned about the quality when it came in, but after a couple weeks and a multitude of workouts under my belt (pun intended), I love it! Chain is longer than others I've used in the past, but I see that as a positive, for it lends to the versatility. And the graphics look great!
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a Dip Belt then look no further.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good dip belt. I've used it for dips and pull ups with 90lbs attached to it. I didn't find any tearing or ripping of the stitching or any other damage after inspecting it after use. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: So much potential
customer_reviews.text: One clip on the chain is already bent out of shape after less than a month. Took it off after pull ups and saw it was bent. No idea how. Can’t bend it back. Otherwise the chain is nice and long and the rest seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great belt
customer_reviews.text: My gym doesn't have a dip belt and I didn't want to pay too much. This belt is very comfortable and sturdy. It fits my back well and doesn't slide. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: AROO!
customer_reviews.text: Got the Evel Kneivel-Globetrotters-Apollo Creed design. One word: sweet. Used it a couple of times. Sturdy, strong, comfortable. This little trick just changed my workouts for good. A Spartan racer, I can already tell that scaling those 8' walls is going to become a whole lot easier. especially late in the race. I can think of another dozen obstacles that will realize the benefit from using this belt. Both pull-ups and dips became a whole knew thing with this belt. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jstug3

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice now at the gym. First session dips and second pull-ups. Both had perfect chain length and seems very sturdy. Great price. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Stallkamp

customer_reviews.title: Worth every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying a belt like this and I have used it for a week now and I must say it's an awesome belt. Very well made, very supportive and the way the belt lays on your back is very comfortable. The chain is strong as well but the only thing that might be more beneficial is if the chain was a tad bit longer. I put the chain through the one hole and then I put it through the weight and connect it. I feel it's more comfortable that way. But all in all this belt is great and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wear it!
customer_reviews.text: Moose has some really quality products. I also have their knee wraps. Really great strength and durability all around. I really love this for weighted pull ups. Plus I feel like I'm wearing a sweet championship belt every time I put it on! Its the small things... ;)
customer_reviews.author: ASCENDER

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend for heavy lifters
customer_reviews.text: These are affordable and nice looking but materials and construction look weak. Didn't keep them as it seemed like would not last long enough to justify the price. If you're considering something like this vs those with a nylon strap, go with the chain as it's most versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, but I needed a smaller size
customer_reviews.text: It's an outstanding equipment, but my pants waist size is 30 and this belt is clearly too big for me. I can use it, absolutely, but have to buckle the two D rings together otherwise it risks falling.
customer_reviews.author: Fabrício

customer_reviews.title: Belt squat use....
customer_reviews.text: Given the price, we attempted to use this for our belt squat- and it was useful. It has held up from a SHW to a MWW use, would repurchase if the need was there.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5 foot 9 150 pounds with around 30 waist and it's a nice addition to my current fitness set up, I say if I was maybe little bigger waist size it even be better fit but honestly can't go wrong with this if ur looking to up your dip and pull up and chin up strength, I am liking it
customer_reviews.author: phil1014

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and strong
customer_reviews.text: Well made, I’ve strapped 90lbs to it for dips and the chain holds up fine and the belt doesn’t cut into your sides. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: i use it to add weight to my pull-ups. only use 30lbs max. no bending or tearing at all. i'd imagine it might not handle extreme amounts of weight, but i think as long as you stay under 100lbs you won't have too many issue.
customer_reviews.author: pratt

customer_reviews.title: Must be a pricing mistake
customer_reviews.text: The price has got to be wrong. This product is as good or better than I have found in any gym in 40 years of visits. Get it fast my friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Decaturranger

customer_reviews.title: If you need a dip belt, consider this one.
customer_reviews.text: The leather belt at my gym broke. I have no idea how long it will take to replace, so I decided to get my own. The flag design is awesome and the belt is comfortable and works well. The chain is nice and long.
customer_reviews.author: Peter W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty poor quality. It does help you add weight but after 2-3months of light use. It completely fell apart. Go for a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Zaric

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: The belt were difficult to wear and use. Kinda hassle and uncomfortable. Also it was much bigger than expected. Not my favorite here.
customer_reviews.author: JP Collection

customer_reviews.title: Quality, quality, quality
customer_reviews.text: Well this product looks great and is made up of awesome quality, so far I have added 90 extra pounds when I do dips and it holds up great! I love it and will do an update when I add more weight.
customer_reviews.author: Matt chang

customer_reviews.title: Lower back support and compression.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on and take off. This high quality belt was built to last and has a great design. I like the logo, too. The attached chain is very strong and has a carabiner on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt, great price
customer_reviews.text: Only used this once but it seems legit. No complaints and feels well made. I like that they included a thank you 10% coupon too...i’ll look to see what other products they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Klein

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Solid and we'll made. Stitching and chain are all high quality. Would definitely buy again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dips and pull-ups
customer_reviews.text: I have a 32 inch waist so the weights hang pretty low for dips but you can double up the chain to take up slack. Belt is very comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Morgoth

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Not what is advertised and not worth the money. The chain is not heavy duty the links are not welded closed and can easy open with a load. Also belt measured 32.5 inches not 33. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Stuck clip
customer_reviews.text: One of the two clips that links the chain to the belt itself was stuck on arrival. I am unable to adjust the length of the chain or even remove the chain from the belt. Disappointing quality. ** Update from 2* to 4*: Luckily, support was quick to send out a replacement belt, free of charge and without needing the original back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: If I had this belt, it would last forever. However, I bought it for my grandsons. They love it for adding weight when they do dips and pullups.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rost

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Better than a lot of belts made by competitors. Dmoose stand by their products, and I appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage. Well less than a year and the stitching is pulling apart. Just ordered one from Rogue, which is probably what I should have done in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Metal hooks came rusted
customer_reviews.text: The belt looks sturdy but the metal chain hook came rusted and I can barely open it. Once opened, the hook does not close and doesn't have any tension in the pivoting part. I don't think I can use it and now I'm too lazy to repackage this and send it back...
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Weighted Belt
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this weighted belt for chin ups and dips. I've noticed it's very comfortable and simple to work with, allowing me to quickly load and unload plates without too much effort. It seems very durable so far and I will update if there is any change in that impression, so no news is good news!
customer_reviews.author: Avi Kaiserman

customer_reviews.title: good belt, not so good metal rings
customer_reviews.text: belt is nice and comfortable, but the “D” shaped ring gave out and separated, not the quality I was looking for and it wasn’t loaded with that much weight, less than half of the 300 lbs it claims
customer_reviews.author: Allen Braunbeck

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy i almost docked it a star because the chain ...
customer_reviews.text: affordable, very sturdy i almost docked it a star because the chain carabiners are a little small but it's just really not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable belt
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable belt. I used it once, so don't know how it will hold up, but it worked great on first try. I wish the carabiners were a little more heavy duty, but it will get the job done. I might replace them with something bigger: easy to do. Chain could also be a bit heavier, but for the price, and the amount of weight I'll be using, I'm guessing it will hold up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the gym it’s light weight but very good material to handle a heavy load! Definitely one of my favorite things to keep in my gym bag
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Austin

customer_reviews.title: The right width
customer_reviews.text: This belt is the right width to stay in place without getting in the way or being too thin to squeeze you while you are working out. It's a great addition to your workout gear.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Tearing - However
customer_reviews.text: After one use, it’s already tearing. It’s comfortable and exactly what I need, but this is unacceptable. However customer service is 2nd to none, so I would not worry about buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin Grebelsky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my workout!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It's super comfortable and easy to use whenever I want to add weight to a dip or pull up! No need to keep buying vests, I just have to change our a plate and done! Very comfortable on my waist/hips which I was very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Janet B.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Here come the gains! I plan to use the belt for dips and pull ups.... I’m hyped!
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this belt to do weighted dips and weighted pull-ups. Super comfortable, easy to add and remove weights.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Wish chains were bigger
customer_reviews.text: Very stable on the back but wish chains were thicker and the clips were more rugged for heavier weights. Can change them out though.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Forman

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product/Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Quality product all around. I received an email shortly after ordering from Maynard who wanted to ensure I received the item in a timely manner. I found the email out of the ordinary, most emails I receive are usually drafted by some marketing pro and have no personal touch. Not this one though, Maynard made me feel like a valued customer. Which is the main reason for the review. Don’t lose that touch. There are still plenty of people in America that value such service. If you are looking for a quality product and excellent customer service look no further!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Well done DMoose!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid and fits great. No uncomfortablity from weight pulling down on lower back. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: I recognized the quality of this belt as soon as I took it out of the box. Then I put it on. This is absolutely the most comfortable dip belt I've ever put on. Additionally, the chain is versatile and can easily accommodate a few plates at a time. This is the first product that I've purchased from DMoose and based on the quality, I will look to this company first for my future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband. I’ve heard him complain of the belt pinching him in the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Ryea

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I’d recommend it. It works like it should. It feels sturdy when you are doing weighted dips and pull-ups. I like how it has the clips on both sides. The chain is smaller than some others, but that’s fine if you are a normal body builder. So unless you are “the mountain “ this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite comfortable,easy to use,durable.
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be capable of carrying heavy weights (up to 150 pounds in plates) without imbalance and a lot of stress on the back. The chain is high quality doesnt bend under pressure-I pursued a high quality belt for pull ups/chin ups that doesnt fail under pressure and I can gladly say I have found what I've been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: idan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product- beef up the clips
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, it looks and works great. It holds up and feels comfortable with a natural fit. The only thing I would change is that the clips are small and could be more ergonomic. When clipping and un-clipping the chain to swap weights I get close to pinching my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: I've owned 3. Great belt!
customer_reviews.text: I've lost two of these after accidentally leaving them at my nearby gym, and them growing legs, smh. I liked it enough to buy it two more times over the past year. I've done pullups with up to 75lb dumbbells, and dips with up to two 45 plates (hit 10 reps this week), without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lonneye Nicolas Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for pull-ups and dips. Holding weight good and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Cedric

customer_reviews.title: Not Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Almost dropped the weight on my feet Not heavy duty as advertised
customer_reviews.author: bo

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great belt for the money. You can spend much more for a name brand belt, but won’t get anything this product doesn’t offer. I have used it for a few months now and find it comfortable and easy to use. I have only loaded it to 100 pounds, but believe it will take whatever you can throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Balinger

customer_reviews.title: Does what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this with 50 pounds and it is doing fine. I'm sure you could find something stronger if you're going to be lifting 200 pounds, otherwise, this is a good place to start.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: worthy product
customer_reviews.text: This product has performed as advertised and excellent price for an added challenge.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the belt for a couple weeks so far. It's more comfortable then the leather belt at the gym. Great price. It appears to be well constructed, but I've only used up to a 45 lb plate. We'll see how well it holds up after a year and heavier weights. I recommend this belt for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my workout gear
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable belt and quality chain. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my gym. The caribeners were really tough at first but broke in quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Landers

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and high quality, the chain is very short however, I would prefer a longer chain but this is still usable
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas Mofardin

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: Love it, affordable and has no problem holding 2 plates 80lbs which is enough for me. Don’t think I’ll need to use more but if I do I’ll update it.
customer_reviews.author: Adamwilson301

customer_reviews.title: DMoose fitness Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second product by DMoose fitness I have purchased and once again they have not let me down, except for all this weight I'm using with this belt.
customer_reviews.author: Wezzly

customer_reviews.title: Economic and Ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: The design and capacity for even more plates really helps me amp up the intensity in my workouts. I've had people come up to me wanting to purchase it. It screams quality. Stop eye shopping and get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonhoi V.

product_meta.title: DMoose Fitness Dip Belt with Chain for Weightlifting, Pullups, Powerlifting, Crossfit, and Bodybuilding Workouts, Long Heavy Duty Steel, Comfortable Neoprene Waist Support
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :12 x 2 x 6 inches; 12.7 Ounces
 * Date First Available :January 12, 2017
 * Manufacturer :DMoose
 * ASIN :B01N5PB7CZ

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #5,232 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #6 inWeight Lifting Belts 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars1,362 ratings
feature_bullets: INCREASE STRENGTH AND MUSCLE GAINS: Ideal for weightlifting, CrossFit, bodybuilding, pullups and general fitness this dip lifting belt helps target the pec major, pec minor, triceps, rhomboids, traps, and deltoid muscle groups.

PREMIUM STEEL CHAIN: The DMoose dip pullup belt features a long 36” heavy duty steel chain that helps improve strength and stability while helping to avoid personal areas or clothing during lifts to ensure better safety and support.

STRONG, REINFORCED CRAFTSMANSHIP: This dip workout belt was is a wider, more resilient design with double stitching, heavy duty neoprene that breathes, and enhanced construction that offers long lasting durability against wear and tear.

CLASSIC COMFORT, UNBEATABLE STYLE: Just because you’re sweating and working hard in the gym doesn’t mean you can’t be original. These weightlifting belts come in black, gray camo, gray, blue, and even an American pride color.

GENUINE LIFETIME GUARANTEE: Here at DMoose we believe in creating durable, long lasting fitness products that support every rep, workout, and goal, which is why every product is backed by a full refund or replacement guarantee.
